channel.title: CVE Feed for ISC -- BIND

item.title: CVE-2022-0635|2024-09-17T02:21:44.299Z -- isc -- bind
item.description: Versions affected: BIND 9.18.0 When a vulnerable version of named receives a series of specific queries, the named process will eventually terminate due to a failed assertion check.
